title: I'm the Tall One
subtle: Personal Narrative (nonfiction), 368 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 510L
description: Differences make us special, but they can also make us self-conscious. I'm the Tall One explores the dynamics of being set apart from your peers. Students will learn important lessons about valuing their individual traits as they work on reading skills such as determining problem and solution and using pronouns.
reviewWords: amusement park, height, measure, nudged, odd, pouting, proud, slouch, teased
comprehension: Problem and Solution                : Determine problem and solution
awareness: Variant Vowel Sounds                : Discriminate variant vowel /ou/ sound
